about.title: About Baptiste Leroux
about.subtitle: Executive IT Leader & Global Delivery Expert
about.intro: With 20+ years of international experience, I bridge the gap between enterprise governance and startup agility, helping organizations scale their digital capabilities globally.
about.backgroundText: I founded and scaled StarTechUp Inc. from a 4-person startup to a 50-person international software agency generating $5M+ revenue. This journey taught me the critical balance between rapid growth and sustainable operations, giving me unique insights into both entrepreneurial agility and enterprise-scale challenges.
expertiseItems: Executive IT Leadership: Proven P&L responsibility for $5M+ technology operations
Global Team Management: 11 years managing 50-person offshore operations across Asia
SaaS Product Development: 50+ solutions delivered across finance, insurance, IoT, and B2C platforms
Cultural Bridge Expertise: Seamless coordination between European, American, and Asian business cultures
Digital Transformation: From Oracle enterprise systems to modern cloud-native architectures
about.approachText: I combine hands-on technical expertise with executive-level strategic thinking. Having built and scaled teams internationally, I understand both the operational challenges of global delivery and the strategic imperatives of digital transformation. My consulting approach focuses on practical, implementable solutions that deliver measurable business value.
credentialsItems: Scaled operations across 10+ countries with proven cultural expertise
Generated $5M+ revenue through technology solutions and team scaling
Managed 100+ successful project deliveries with enterprise and startup clients
Proven track record in both B2B and B2C SaaS product development

overview.title: Why Choose Baptiste Leroux?

overview.card3Desc: 50+ SaaS solutions delivered across diverse industries with proven scaling and architecture expertise.

aia.title: Meet Aïa, Your Intelligent Guide
aia.subtitle: I'm here to help you discover how Baptiste can accelerate your digital transformation
aia.intro: Hello! I'm Aïa, the intelligent assistant for Alpa Stratégie. I know Baptiste Leroux's expertise inside out—from his 20+ years leading international teams to scaling software agencies from 4 to 50+ people.
aia.contextPrompt: To give you the most relevant guidance, tell me a bit about yourself:
aia.chatPlaceholder: Ask me anything about Baptiste's services...
aia.closeTooltip: You can reopen Aïa anytime with the chat icon
aia.welcome: I'm ready to help! What would you like to know about Baptiste's consulting services?
aia.error: I apologize, but I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try refreshing or contact Baptiste directly.
aia.suggestedQuestionsTitle: Here are some questions I can help with:

default: Who is Baptiste Leroux and what does he do?
What kind of missions does he usually take on as PM / PMO / CTO / CPTO?
In what situations does it make sense to work with him?
recruiter: What types of interim PMO / CTO / CPTO missions does Baptiste usually take?
In what kinds of organizations and sectors has he delivered successful missions?
Can you summarize his key achievements and typical impact on assignments?
client: In what ways can Baptiste help a company like ours with digital transformation or IT governance?
What does a typical engagement with Baptiste look like, from first contact to delivery?
How does he work with internal teams (IT, product, business) to drive measurable outcomes?
partner: How can Baptiste collaborate with us on client projects (roles, scope, responsibilities)?
What experience does he have setting up and managing offshore or hybrid delivery teams?
What types of partnership models does he usually consider with consulting firms or agencies?
investor: How can Baptiste support a board or C-level team in assessing and reorganizing IT and digital delivery?
What experience does he have running technology or software due diligence for startups and scale-ups?
How does he advise on building offshore or hybrid engineering teams to scale software development and innovation?
curious: What is Baptiste's experience with outsourcing and offshore development teams?
How broad is his technology knowledge across stacks, tools, and platforms?
How does his background combine corporate consulting with startup and scale-up environments?
other: Who is Baptiste Leroux and what does he do?
What kind of missions does he usually take on as PM / PMO / CTO / CPTO?
In what situations does it make sense to work with him?
